NFLSimulatoR 0.1.0

  • Changelog

NFLSimulatoR

An R Package for simulating plays and drives in the NFL.

Website

The NFLSimulatoR package website is hosted at datacolorado.com/NFLSimulatoR.

Overview

NFLSimulatoR (version 0.1.0) is an R package that enables the simulation of plays/drives and the evaluation of game-play strategies in the National Football League (NFL). The package itself is inspired by a blog post by Mike Lopez, currently the Director of Data and Analytics at the NFL

Getting Started

If you are just getting started with NFLSimulatoR, we recommend reading an upcoming paper related to use cases
